alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Grundy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 03 at 4:17PM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Bedford, Cannon, Coffee, Cumberland, De Kalb, Grundy, Putnam, Van Buren, Warren and White. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Also, rapid rises along small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 417 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated moderate to heavy rain. Minor flooding has been reported by spotters in White county, and additional flooding is likely across the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cookeville, Shelbyville, McMinnville, Crossville, Manchester, Sparta, Smithville, Spencer, Fairfield Glade, Monterey, Morrison, Wartrace, Pleasant Hill, Doyle, Centertown, Normandy, Viola, Rock Island State Park, Bakers Crossroads and Burgess Falls State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
